version_description: Bug fixes and minor gameplay improvements.
Bug fixes and minor gameplay improvements.

My Talking Tom Friends game is now live world-wide!
New activities, items and mini-games available!
Check the calendar for special rewards!

New activities, items and mini-games available!
Check the calendar for special rewards!

My Talking Tom Friends game is now live world-wide!
New activities, items and mini-games available!
Check the calendar for special rewards!

THE TREEHOUSE IS NOW OPEN!
A whole new room of fun!
Discover fun stories in the calendar!
New mini-game: Marble Mix Up!

THE TREEHOUSE IS NOW OPEN!
A whole new room of fun!
Discover fun stories in the calendar!
New mini-game: Marble Mix Up!

A BRAND NEW INSTRUMENT!
A shiny new keyboard has arrived! Experiment with fun sounds and crazy effects, and watch Tom and friends learn tunes, perform duets and play songs for one another.

SMOOTHER GAMEPLAY
We’ve been making lots of improvements behind the scenes to make sure life in the house is as smooth and as purr-fect as possible.

A BRAND NEW INSTRUMENT!
A shiny new keyboard has arrived! Experiment with fun sounds and crazy effects, and watch Tom and friends learn tunes, perform duets and play songs for one another.

SMOOTHER GAMEPLAY
We’ve been making lots of improvements behind the scenes to make sure life in the house is as smooth and as purr-fect as possible.

DISCOVER SMOOTHIES! Experiment and see special effects.
CELEBRATE HALLOWEEN! Enjoy spooky decorations and treats.

GET INTO THE HOLIDAY SPIRIT
The holidays have arrived and the house is full of twinkling lights, festive decorations and favorite foods. There are brand new costumes, too… And guess what? It snowed!

GET INTO THE HOLIDAY SPIRIT
The holidays have arrived and the house is full of twinkling lights, festive decorations and favorite foods. There are brand new costumes, too… And guess what? It snowed!

BRIGHT AND LUCKY DECORATIONS
Enjoy the glow of lanterns and fireworks

BRIGHT AND LUCKY DECORATIONS
Enjoy the glow of lanterns and fireworks

HAVE FUN WITH STICKERS & CELEBRATE SPRING
What’s that on the bookshelf? A brand new sticker album! Start collecting stickers and build a beautiful book of moments. On top of that, Spring has arrived, and there are colorful outfits and cheerful decorations to enjoy.

HAVE FUN WITH STICKERS & CELEBRATE SPRING
What’s that on the bookshelf? A brand new sticker album! Start collecting stickers and build a beautiful book of moments. On top of that, Spring has arrived, and there are colorful outfits and cheerful decorations to enjoy.
